robocode
Class _AdvancedRobot

java.lang.Object
  robocode._Robot
      robocode.Robot
          robocode._AdvancedRobot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
_AdvancedRadiansRobot
public class _AdvancedRobot
extends Robot

This class is used by the system as a placeholder for all deprecated calls.

You should create a AdvancedRobot instead.

There is no guarantee that this class will exist in future versions of Robocode.

Author:
Mathew A. Nelson
See Also:
AdvancedRobot
